text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “Trying to get into Donald Trump’s head is more difficult than finding a vaccine for coronavirus. First he decided on a lockdown and then he encouraged protests against the lockdown that he promoted. It’s like a Mel Brooks film.” 

https://t.co/0i7Y7aZHEk
